scripts.lint: for d in packages/*; do [ -f "$d/package.json" ] && (cd "$d" && bun run --if-present lint); done
scripts.lint:fix: for d in packages/*; do [ -f "$d/package.json" ] && (cd "$d" && bun run --if-present lint:fix); done
scripts.lint:ci: for d in packages/*; do [ -f "$d/package.json" ] && (cd "$d" && bun run --if-present lint:ci); done
scripts.format: for d in packages/*; do [ -f "$d/package.json" ] && (cd "$d" && bun run --if-present format); done
scripts.knip: for d in packages/*; do [ -f "$d/package.json" ] && (cd "$d" && bun run --if-present knip); done
scripts.check: bun run lint:fix && bun run format && bun run knip
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && bun run --workspaces --if-present clean
